pageProduct.name: Oil Garden Fractionated Coconut Body Oil 100ml
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Fractionated COCONUT Moisturising body oil

Warnings

Store below 30C. Not to be taken orally. Keep out of reach of children.

Common Uses

Pure fractionated COCONUT oil infused with Vitamin E to hydrate and moisturise total body and reveal a smooth, satin finish to improve and balance skin tone.

Non greasy and instantly absorbed, the properties of fractionated (liquidized) coconut replenish and nourish the skin delivering pure hydration for ultimate skin health. Produced without heat or chemicals to ensure optimum concentration of all the natural nutrients

Ingredients

Coconut Fractions (Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride) & Natural Vitamin E Oil (Tocopherol)

Directions

Use daily as an all over BODY and FACE MOISTURISER. Also suitable to naturally nourish lips and hair, remove makeup and as an ideal base for Aromatheraphy blending.
